categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The Enhanced T2-B Repulsor Tank was a variant of the T2-B Repulsor Tank used by the Rebel Alliance during Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. It had been outfitted with enhanced power couplings and sub-systems, which allowed its weapons to fire high powered blasts at a faster rate than average. The performance modifications were built around existing systems, which visibly altered the appearance of the Enhanced T2-B Repulsor Tank from the standard model, with one such difference being the addition of dark colored armor plates.
